Topic Summary: This appeal relates to a benefit, in the form of an inheritance, received by the Appellant. It is being brought by the Appellant's estate against an assessment raised by Revenue on the inheritance and includes a surcharge.
Tax Legislation: Sections 30(4), 30(8), Section 46(2A)(a), Section 53A(3)(b), Section 51 of Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003
